name: Farnaahx
culture_notes: Speaks a Riveric-influenced Coastal Tongue dialect
Diet heavy on smoked fish and fermented estuary vegetables
Signals and bell-rituals govern daily market hours
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind-influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Population undocumented; functions as a small trade/ritual transshipment point
Access depends on seasonal tides and local charts; reagent supply lines are strategic
